sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from ( select a.id, a.yonghuzhanghao , a.huiyuanleixing , a.kaishishijian , a.daoqishijian , a.shengyucishu , a.zhifufangshi , a.shouliren , a.shoulishijian , a.shenpi , a.erjiguanlianzd , a.fuJian ,a.itime,a.detail,a.deleteFlag from zhucehuiyuan a where 1=1
a.id = #id#
a.yonghuzhanghao like '%$yonghuzhanghaoSearch$%'
a.huiyuanleixing like '%$huiyuanleixingSearch$%'
a.kaishishijian like '%$kaishishijianSearch$%'
a.daoqishijian like '%$daoqishijianSearch$%'
a.shengyucishu like '%$shengyucishuSearch$%'
a.zhifufangshi like '%$zhifufangshiSearch$%'
a.shouliren like '%$shoulirenSearch$%'
a.shoulishijian like '%$shoulishijianSearch$%'
a.shenpi like '%$shenpiSearch$%'
DATE_FORMAT(a.itime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') >= DATE_FORMAT(#itimeStartSearch#,'%Y-%m-%d %T')
DATE_FORMAT(a.itime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') <= DATE_FORMAT(#itimeEndSearch#,'%Y-%m-%d %T')
a.operatorId = #operatorId#
a.deleteFlag = #deleteFlagSearch#
a.erjiguanlianzd = #erjiguanlianzd#
$dataRight$
order by $orderby$
)table_a

select a.id, a.yonghuzhanghao , a.huiyuanleixing , a.kaishishijian , a.daoqishijian , a.shengyucishu , a.zhifufangshi , a.shouliren , a.shoulishijian , a.shenpi , a.erjiguanlianzd , a.fuJian ,a.itime, a.detail,a.deleteFlag from zhucehuiyuan a where 1=1
a.id = #id#
a.yonghuzhanghao like '%$yonghuzhanghaoSearch$%'
a.huiyuanleixing like '%$huiyuanleixingSearch$%'
a.kaishishijian like '%$kaishishijianSearch$%'
a.daoqishijian like '%$daoqishijianSearch$%'
a.shengyucishu like '%$shengyucishuSearch$%'
a.zhifufangshi like '%$zhifufangshiSearch$%'
a.shouliren like '%$shoulirenSearch$%'
a.shoulishijian like '%$shoulishijianSearch$%'
a.shenpi like '%$shenpiSearch$%'
DATE_FORMAT(a.itime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') >= DATE_FORMAT(#itimeStartSearch#,'%Y-%m-%d %T')
DATE_FORMAT(a.itime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') <= DATE_FORMAT(#itimeEndSearch#,'%Y-%m-%d %T')
a.operatorId = #operatorId#
a.deleteFlag = #deleteFlagSearch#
a.erjiguanlianzd = #erjiguanlianzd#
$dataRight$
order by $orderby$
sqlMap.update: insert into zhucehuiyuan (yonghuzhanghao,huiyuanleixing,kaishishijian,daoqishijian,shengyucishu,zhifufangshi,shouliren,shoulishijian,shenpi, fuJian ,operatorId,itime,detail,erjiguanlianzd) values(#yonghuzhanghao#,#huiyuanleixing#,#kaishishijian#,#daoqishijian#,#shengyucishu#,#zhifufangshi#,#shouliren#,#shoulishijian#,#shenpi#,#fuJian#,#operatorId#,(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual),#detail#,#erjiguanlianzd#)

update zhucehuiyuan set yonghuzhanghao=#yonghuzhanghao#,huiyuanleixing=#huiyuanleixing#,kaishishijian=#kaishishijian#,daoqishijian=#daoqishijian#,shengyucishu=#shengyucishu#,zhifufangshi=#zhifufangshi#,shouliren=#shouliren#,shoulishijian=#shoulishijian#,shenpi=#shenpi# ,fuJian=#fuJian#
, itime=(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual),detail=#detail# where id=#id#
update zhucehuiyuan set shengyucishu=shengyucishu-1 where yonghuzhanghao=#yonghuzhanghao#
update zhucehuiyuan set deleteFlag=#deleteFlag# where id in ( $id$ )
update zhucehuiyuan set shenpi=#shenpi# where id in ( $id$ )
sqlMap.select:
select IFNULL(a.tuPian,'') as tuPian from zhucehuiyuan a where 1=1
a.id = #id#
sqlMap.update: update zhucehuiyuan set tuPian=#tuPianIndex# where id in ( $id$ )
insert into table_pic (tuPianIndex,picName,picPath,operatorId,itime,detail) values(#tuPianIndex#,#picName#,#picPath#,#operatorId#,(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual),#detail#)
sqlMap.select:
select id,tuPianIndex,picName,picPath,operatorId,itime,detail from table_pic where 1=1
tuPianIndex = ( select distinct tuPian from zhucehuiyuan where id=#id# and deleteFlag=0 )
sqlMap.update: delete from table_pic where id in ( $id$ )
